Title: Samba
Writer: Éric Toledano (scenario), Olivier Nakache (scenario), Delphine Coulin (collaboration), Muriel Coulin (collaboration), Delphine Coulin (novel)
Actors: Omar Sy, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Tahar Rahim, Izïa Higelin
Plot: Senegalese Samba has worked 10 years in France. He's arrested and befriends the woman helping him with legal matters as volunteer after a burnout at work. He's released after being told to leave France. Chemistry?
Language: French, English, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian, Arabic
